name: Dungeon Healer Simulator: Jam Edition
description:
Experience the thrill of healing your party to victory over 4 floors of dungeons. Can you defeat the final boss?

You must choose your upgrades carefully along the way if you hope to stand up to the challenge!

Mouse/Touch Controls: Click a party member's Health Bar, then click a Heal Spell to cast it.

Keyboard Controls:

  • W/S/Up/Down: select party member
  • A/D/Left/Right: select heal spell
  • Space/Enter: cast heal spell

This game was created for the "My First Game Jam" of Summer 2022, between July 2 and July 15. Thank you to the organizers of the jam. The idea for this game would not exist without being assigned the theme "Heal."

This game features 2 musical contributions licensed from Will Maupin: the menu theme and the victory theme. A big thank you to Will for helping bring the game to life with those tracks. All other assets were created by Studio Barefoot.

Thanks for playing! Your feedback on your experience is appreciated, comment below!
